author: Ivan Mehta
title: Google introduces "Continuous Scrolling" on desktop for Search
description: Google is introducing a "Continuous Scrolling" feature on desktop so users don't have to navigate across pages to find the relevant search results.

author: Manish Singh
title: Amazon set to launch Prime Gaming in India
description: Amazon is inching closer to launching its gaming subscription service, Prime Gaming, to its Prime subscribers in India.

author: Rebecca Bellan
title: Onomotion raises â‚¬21 million to expand e-cargo bike urban logistics business
description: Berlin-based Onomotion's urban logistics solution is based on cargo e-bikes with built-in cover from the elements and attachable containers.

author: Manish Singh
title: SBM Bank India, building BaaS platform, seeks funding at $200 million valuation
description: SBM Bank India is engaging with investors to raise capital and pitching the vision of becoming one of the top banking-as-a-service providers.

author: Rebecca Bellan
title: TuSimple and Navistar end deal to co-develop autonomous trucks
description: TuSimple and Navistar had agreed to jointly develop self-driving trucks by 2024, but now the two companies have scrapped their deal.
